info.title: PostNL API
info.description: PostNL API description for send, track, checkout and delivery options

get.summary: Returns the statuses for a particular barcode
get.description:
Request example:
```
curl -X GET "https://api-sandbox.postnl.nl/shipment/v2/status/barcode/3SDEVC172649258" \
 -H "Accept: application/json" \
 -H "apikey: APIKEY-HERE" \
```

parameters.name: barcode
parameters.description: Barcode of the shipment. This is a unique value.

parameters.name: detail
parameters.description: Option to include old statuses in the response

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language of the returned shipment and status descriptions (default is Dutch).

parameters.name: maxDays
parameters.description: Limit the number of days that will be searched (decrease this amount for better performance).

example.message: Failed to resolve API Key variable 'request.header.apikey'
Only GET requests allowed
Too many requests. Rate limit exceeded!

get.summary: Get status information by customer reference
get.description:
Request example:
```
curl -X GET "https://api-sandbox.postnl.nl/shipment/v2/status/reference?detail=true&language=NL&customerCode={{CustomerCode}}&customerNumber={{CustomerNumber}}&reference=REF98173245876329" \
 -H "Accept: application/json" \
 -H "apikey: APIKEY-HERE" 
```

parameters.name: customerCode
parameters.description: Customer code as known at PostNL Pakketten

parameters.name: customerNumber
parameters.description: Customer number as known at PostNL Pakketten

parameters.name: referenceId
parameters.description: The customer reference belonging to the shipment

parameters.name: detail
parameters.description: Option to include old statuses in the response

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language of the returned shipment and status descriptions (default is Dutch).

parameters.name: maxDays
parameters.description: Limit the number of days that will be searched (decrease this amount for better performance). By default this is 90 days in the past.

parameters.name: barcode

get.summary: Returns the updated statuses for a particular customer number
get.description:
Request example:
```
curl -X GET "https://api-sandbox.postnl.nl/shipment/v2/status/11223344/updatedshipments?period=2022-12-25T10:00:00&period=2022-12-25T10:12:00" \
 -H "Accept: application/json" \
 -H "apikey: APIKEY-HERE" \
```

parameters.name: customernumber
parameters.description: Your customer number

parameters.name: period[0]
parameters.description: Optional array which defines a specific period in which to return updated shipments. For optimal results, schedule calls at a frequency between 5-15 minutes and align the requested period accordingly to ensure complete coverage of past updates. Shorter periods yield improved response times. The API accommodates a maximum requested period of 2 hours, granting access to shipment data up to 48 hours in the past. Please use the following format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS and repeat this variable to define the period (e.g. /updatedshipments?period=2022-11-07T12:00:00.000&period=2022-11-07T12:05:00.000).

parameters.name: period[1]
parameters.description: Optional array which defines a specific period in which to return updated shipments. For optimal results, schedule calls at a frequency between 5-15 minutes and align the requested period accordingly to ensure complete coverage of past updates. Shorter periods yield improved response times. The API accommodates a maximum requested period of 2 hours, granting access to shipment data up to 48 hours in the past. Please use the following format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS and repeat this variable to define the period (e.g. /updatedshipments?period=2022-11-07T12:00:00.000&period=2022-11-07T12:05:00.000).

parameters.name: confirm
parameters.description: With the Confirm boolean in the request, you can determine if you want to confirm the shipment in the same call or not. If the Boolean variable is true the shipment will be preannounced. If this is set to false, then an additional Confirming API request needs to be made.

Errors.Description: Incorrect address specified in address type Sender

get.description:
Request example:
```
curl -X GET "https://api-sandbox.postnl.nl/shipment/v1_1/barcode?CustomerCode=DEVC&CustomerNumber=11223344&Type=3S&Serie=000000000-999999999&amp" \
 -H "Accept: application/json" \
 -H "apikey: APIKEY-HERE" 
```

parameters.name: CustomerCode
parameters.description: The customer code for which you want a barcode to be generated

parameters.name: CustomerNumber
parameters.description: The customer code for which you want a barcode to be generated

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: The barcode type that you want to be generated

parameters.name: Serie
parameters.description: Barcode serie in the format '###000000-###000000', for example 100000-20000. The range must consist of a minimal difference of 100.000. It is allowed to add extra leading zeros at the beginning of the serie. See [Guidelines](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/api-endpoints/send-track/barcode/guidelines) for more information.

parameters.name: Range
parameters.description: Only used for International Mail and Packet products (PEPS) shipments (with type LA, RI, UE). Identifying the issuing postal administration's country (NL in this case).

get.description:
Request example:
```
curl -X GET "https://api-sandbox.postnl.nl/shipment/v2_2/calculate/date/delivery?ShippingDate=29-05-2022+14%3A00%3A00&ShippingDuration=1&CutOffTime=17%3A00%3A00&PostalCode=2132WT&CountryCode=NL&City=Hoofddorp&Street=Siriusdreef&HouseNumber=42&HouseNrExt=A" \
 -H "Accept: application/json" \
 -H "apikey: APIKEY-HERE" 
```

parameters.name: ShippingDate
parameters.description: Date/time of preparing the shipment for sending. Format: dd-MM-yyyy hh:mm:ss

parameters.name: ShippingDuration
parameters.description: The duration it takes for the shipment to be delivered to PostNL in days. A value of 1 means that the parcel will be delivered to PostNL on the same day as the date specified in ShippingDate. A value of 2 means the parcel will arrive at PostNL a day later etc.

parameters.name: CutOffTime
parameters.description: Default cutoff time

parameters.name: PostalCode
parameters.description: Zipcode of the destination address

parameters.name: CountryCode
parameters.description: The ISO2 destination country code

parameters.name: OriginCountryCode
parameters.description: The ISO2 origin country code

parameters.name: City
parameters.description: City of the destination address

parameters.name: Street
parameters.description: The street name of the destination address.

parameters.name: HouseNumber
parameters.description: The house number of the destination address

parameters.name: HouseNrExt
parameters.description: House number extension of the delivery address

parameters.name: Options
parameters.description: The delivery options that you want to take into account when calculating the expected delivery date

parameters.name: CutOffTimeMonday
parameters.description: Overrides default cutoff time specified in the CutOffTime parameter for mondays specifically

parameters.name: AvailableMonday
parameters.description: Specifies if you are available to ship to PostNL on mondays

parameters.name: CutOffTimeTuesday
parameters.description: Overrides default cutoff time specified in the CutOffTime parameter for tuesdays specifically

parameters.name: AvailableTuesday
parameters.description: Specifies if you are available to ship to PostNL on tuesdays

parameters.name: CutOffTimeWednesday
parameters.description: Overrides default cutoff time specified in the CutOffTime parameter for wednesdays specifically

parameters.name: AvailableWednesday
parameters.description: Specifies if you are available to ship to PostNL on wednesdays

parameters.name: CutOffTimeThursday
parameters.description: Overrides default cutoff time specified in the CutOffTime parameter for thursdays specifically

parameters.name: AvailableThursday
parameters.description: Specifies if you are available to ship to PostNL on thursdays

parameters.name: CutOffTimeFriday
parameters.description: Overrides default cutoff time specified in the CutOffTime parameter for fridays specifically

parameters.name: AvailableFriday
parameters.description: Specifies if you are available to ship to PostNL on fridays

parameters.name: CutOffTimeSaturday
parameters.description: Overrides default cutoff time specified in the CutOffTime parameter for saturdays specifically

parameters.name: AvailableSaturday
parameters.description: Specifies if you are available to ship to PostNL on saturdays

parameters.name: CutOffTimeSunday
parameters.description: Overrides default cutoff time specified in the CutOffTime parameter for sundays specifically

parameters.name: AvailableSunday
parameters.description: Specifies if you are available to ship to PostNL on sundays

get.description:
Request example:
```
curl -X GET "https://api-sandbox.postnl.nl/shipment/v2_2/calculate/date/shipping?DeliveryDate=30-05-2022&ShippingDuration=1&PostalCode=2132WT&CountryCode=NL&City=Hoofddorp&Street=Siriusdreef&HouseNumber=42&HouseNrExt=A" \
 -H "Accept: application/json" \
 -H "apikey: APIKEY-HERE" \

```

parameters.name: DeliveryDate
parameters.description: Date of the expected delivery (to the final destination) of the shipment.

parameters.name: ShippingDuration
parameters.description: The duration it takes for the shipment to be delivered to PostNL in days. A value of 1 means that the parcel will be delivered to PostNL on the same day as the date specified in ShippingDate. A value of 2 means the parcel will arrive at PostNL a day later etc.

parameters.name: PostalCode
parameters.description: Zipcode of the address

parameters.name: CountryCode
parameters.description: The ISO2 destination country code

parameters.name: OriginCountryCode
parameters.description: The ISO2 country code of the origin country

parameters.name: City
parameters.description: City of the destination address

parameters.name: Street
parameters.description: The street name of the destination address

parameters.name: HouseNumber
parameters.description: The house number of the destination address

parameters.name: HouseNrExt
parameters.description: House number extension of the destination address

200.description: The calculated date that the parcel needs to be shipped to PostNL

get.summary: Returns pickup locations nearest to the provided address.
get.description:
Request example:
```
curl -X GET "https://api-sandbox.postnl.nl/shipment/v2_1/locations/nearest?CountryCode=NL&PostalCode=2132WT&City=Hoofddorp&Street=Siriusdreef&HouseNumber=42&HouseNumberExtension=-60&DeliveryDate=24-12-2022&OpeningTime=09%3A00%3A00" \
 -H "Accept: application/json" \
 -H "apikey: APIKEY-HERE" \
```

parameters.name: CountryCode
parameters.description: The country of the recipient's address

parameters.name: PostalCode
parameters.description: The zipcode of the recipient's address

parameters.name: City
parameters.description: The city of the recipient's address

parameters.name: Street
parameters.description: The street name of the recipient's address

parameters.name: HouseNumber
parameters.description: The house number of the recipient's address

parameters.name: HouseNumberExtension
parameters.description: The house number extension of the recipient's address

parameters.name: DeliveryDate
parameters.description: The date of the earliest delivery date at the pickup location. Format:  dd-MM-yyyy. Note: this date cannot be in the past, otherwise an error is returned. If not provided, the present day is used as a default

parameters.name: OpeningTime
parameters.description: Opening time filter. Format: hh:mm:ss. This field will be used to filter out locations that are closed at the time provided. If no opening time is provided all locations will be returned regardless of their opening times.

parameters.name: DeliveryOptions
parameters.description: The pickup location types for which locations should be filtered. By default all location types are returned (PG = Retail points and parcel lockers). This can be used to filter on only parcel lockers (PA) or specifically exclude parcel lockers from the response (PG_EX).

200.description: Locations nearest to the address provided

example.message: Failed to resolve API Key variable 'request.header.apikey'

Too many requests. Rate limit exceeded!

get.summary: Returns pickup locations nearest to the provided coordinates.
get.description:
Request example:
```
curl -X GET "https://api-sandbox.postnl.nl/shipment/v2_1/locations/nearest/geocode?Latitude=52.2864669620795&Longitude=4.68239055845954&CountryCode=NL&DeliveryDate=24-12-2022&OpeningTime=09%3A00%3A00" \
 -H "Accept: application/json" \
 -H "apikey: APIKEY-HERE" \
```

parameters.name: Latitude
parameters.description: The latitude of the location

parameters.name: Longitude
parameters.description: The longitude of the location

parameters.name: CountryCode
parameters.description: The coutry for which the coordinates are provided

parameters.name: DeliveryDate
parameters.description: The date of the earliest delivery date. Format:  dd-MM-yyyy. Note: this date cannot be in the past, otherwise an error is returned.

parameters.name: OpeningTime
parameters.description: Opening time filter. Format: hh:mm:ss. This field will be used to filter out locations that are closed at the time provided.

parameters.name: DeliveryOptions
parameters.description: The pickup location types for which locations should be filtered. By default all location types are returned (PG = Retail points and parcel lockers). This can be used to filter on only parcel lockers (PA) or specifically exclude parcel lockers from the response (PG_EX).

200.description: Locations nearest to the coordinates provided

get.summary: Returns pickup locations within a provided area.
get.description:
Request example:
```
curl -X GET "https://api-sandbox.postnl.nl/shipment/v2_1/locations/area?LatitudeNorth=52.156439&LongitudeWest=5.015643&LatitudeSouth=52.017473&LongitudeEast=5.065254&CountryCode=NL&DeliveryDate=24-12-2023&OpeningTime=09%3A00%3A00" \
 -H "Accept: application/json" \
 -H "apikey: APIKEY-HERE" \
```

parameters.name: LatitudeNorth
parameters.description: The northmost coordinates of the area

parameters.name: LongitudeWest
parameters.description: The westmost coordinates of the area

parameters.name: LatitudeSouth
parameters.description: The southmost coordinates of the area

parameters.name: LongitudeEast
parameters.description: The eastmost coordinates of the area

parameters.name: DeliveryDate
parameters.description: The date of the earliest delivery date. Format:  dd-MM-yyyy. Note: this date cannot be in the past, otherwise an error is returned.

parameters.name: OpeningTime
parameters.description: Opening time filter. Format: hh:mm:ss. This field will be used to filter out locations that are closed at the time provided.

parameters.name: DeliveryOptions
parameters.description: The pickup location types for which locations should be filtered. By default all location types are returned (PG = Retail points and parcel lockers). This can be used to filter on only parcel lockers (PA) or specifically exclude parcel lockers from the response (PG_EX).

200.description: Locations nearest to the area provided

get.description:
Request example:
```
curl -X GET "https://api-sandbox.postnl.nl/shipment/v2_1/calculate/timeframes?AllowSundaySorting=false&StartDate=30-06-2022&EndDate=02-07-2022&CountryCode=NL&PostalCode=2132WT&HouseNumber=42&HouseNrExt=A&City=Hoofddorp&Street=Siriusdreef&Options=Daytime%2CEvening" \
 -H "Accept: application/json" \
 -H "apikey: APIKEY-HERE" \
```

parameters.name: AllowSundaySorting
parameters.description: Whether or not the requesting party allows for Sunday sorting (which leads to delivery on Monday).

parameters.name: StartDate
parameters.description: Date of the beginning of the timeframe. Format: dd-MM-yyyy

parameters.name: EndDate
parameters.description: Date of the enddate of the timeframe. Format:dd-MM-yyyy. Enddate may not be before StartDate.

parameters.name: CountryCode
parameters.description: The ISO2 country code of the delivery address

parameters.name: PostalCode
parameters.description: Zipcode of the delivery address

parameters.name: HouseNumber
parameters.description: The house number of the delivery address

parameters.name: HouseNrExt
parameters.description: House number extension of the delivery address

parameters.name: City
parameters.description: City of the delivery address

parameters.name: Street
parameters.description: The street name of the delivery address

parameters.name: Options
parameters.description: The delivery options for which expected timeframes should be calculated. At least one delivery option must be specified. Multiple values should be comma-separated.

CompleteStatus.description: The current status and old statuses of the shipment

CurrentStatus.description: The current status and old statuses of the shipment

MainBarcode.description: The main barcode of the shipment

ShipmentAmount.description: The amount of parcels in the multi-collo shipment

ShipmentCounter.description: The sequence of this parcel in the multi-collo shipment

ProductCode.description: The product code of the shipment

ProductDescription.description: The description of the product code

Reference.description: The customer reference belonging to the shipment

DeliveryDate.description: The expected delivery date of the shipment

Address.description: A list of addresses belonging to the shipment

Status.description: The current status of the shipment (see the [Status codes](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/t-t-status-codes/event-codes) for possible values.

MainBarcode.description: The main barcode of the shipment

ShipmentAmount.description: The amount of parcels in the multi-collo shipment

ShipmentCounter.description: The sequence of this parcel in the multi-collo shipment

ProductCode.description: The product code of the shipment

ProductDescription.description: The description of the product code

Reference.description: The customer reference belonging to the shipment

DeliveryDate.description: The expected delivery date of the shipment

Address.description: A list of addresses belonging to the shipment

Event.description: The events of the shipment. (see the [Event Codes](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/t-t-status-codes/event-codes) for possible values.

Description.example: Pakket is nog niet door PostNL ontvangen of verwerkt

Status.description: The current status of the shipment (see the [Status codes](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/t-t-status-codes/event-codes) for possible values.

OldStatus.description: A list of previous status codes (see the [Status codes](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/t-t-status-codes/event-codes) for possible values.

OptionCode.description: The product option code for this ProductOption.

shippingstatusAmount.description: The amounts belonging to the shipment

VerzekerdBedrag.description: The insurance amount of the shipment

CustomerCode.description: The customer code of the shipment

CustomerNumber.description: The customer number of the shipment

Barcode.description: The barcode of the shipment for which the signature is returned

SignatureImage.description: The signature content; base64 encoded GIF format.

Barcode.description: The barcode belonging to the status update

updatedShipmentStatus.description: The status update. See [Status codes](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/error-codes) for possible values.

CollectionLocation.description: Code of delivery location at PostNL Pakketten

CustomerCode.description: Customer code as known at PostNL Pakketten

Email.description: E-mail address of the customer. Mandatory for Non EU destinations.

Shipments.description: List of 1 or more Shipments. At least 1 shipment is required.

Addresses.description: List of 1 or more Address type elements. At least 1 address type is mandatory. See [Address types](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/reference-codes/address-types) for the available types.

AddressType.description: Type of the address. This is a code. You can find the possible values at [Address types](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/reference-codes/address-types)

CompanyName.description: This field has a dependency with the field Name. One of both fields must be filled mandatory; using both fields is also allowed. Mandatory when AddressType is 09.

Department.description: Send to specific department of a company

Doorcode.description: Door code of address. Mandatory for some international shipments.

FirstName.description: Remark: please add FirstName and Name (lastname) of the receiver to improve the parcel tracking experience of your customer.

Floor.description: Send to specific floor of a company

HouseNr.description: Mandatory for shipments to Benelux. Max. length is 5 characters (only for Benelux addresses). For Benelux addresses,this field should always be numeric.

Name.description: Last name of person. This field has a dependency with the field CompanyName. One of both fields must be filled mandatory; using both fields is also allowed. Remark: please add FirstName and Name (lastname) of the receiver to improve the parcel tracking experience of your customer.

Region.description: Region of the address. Mandatory for Non EU destinations where a region is applicable.

Street.description: This field has a dependency with the field StreetHouseNrExt. One of both fields must be filled mandatory. Using both fields simultaneously is discouraged.

StreetHouseNrExt.description: Combination of Street, HouseNr and HouseNrExt. Please see [Guidelines](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/api-endpoints/send-track/confirming/guidelines) for the explanation.

Zipcode.description: Zipcode of the address. Mandatory for shipments to Benelux. Max length (NL) 6 characters,(BE;LU) 4 numeric characters

Amounts.description: List of amount types. An amount represents a value of the shipment. Amount type 01 mandatory for COD-shipments, Amount type 02 mandatory for domestic insured shipments. Please see [Amount types](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/reference-codes/amount-types) for the available types.

AmountType.description: Amount type. Please see [Amount types](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/reference-codes/amount-types) for the available types.

BIC.description: BIC number,optional for COD shipments (mandatory for bank account number other than originating in The Netherlands)

Currency.description: Currency code. only EUR, GBP, USD and CNY are allowed.

IBAN.description: IBAN bank account number,mandatory for COD shipments. Dutch IBAN numbers are 18 characters

Value.description: Money value in EUR (unless value Currency is specified for another currency). Value format (N6.2): #####0.00 (2 digits behind decimal dot). Mandatory for COD, Insured products (with the exception of certain productcodes with a standard insured amount).

Barcode.description: Barcode of the shipment. This is a unique value. Note: If you leave this attribute out of your request an unique barcode will be generated automatically.

CodingText.description: Code used for logistic purposes (usually generated by the service itself and returned in the response). Please note that this must be provided when  using the Confirm API to confirm shipments where coding texts are required (e.g. letterbox parcels).

CollectionTimeStampStart.description: Starting date/time of the collection of the shipment. Format: dd-MM-yyyy hh:mm:ss

CollectionTimeStampEnd.description: Ending date/time of the collection of the shipment. Format: dd-MM-yyyy hh:mm:ss

Contacts.description: One or more ContactType elements belonging to a shipment. Mandatory in some cases. Please refer to the available [Contact types](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/reference-codes/contact-types) for the possible values.

ContactType.description: Type of the contact. This is a code. Please refer to the available [Contact types](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/reference-codes/contact-types) for the possible values.

Email.description: Email address of the contact. Mandatory in some cases. Either the Email or Telnr needs to be filled in for Non EU destinations. Please see [Guidelines](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/api-endpoints/send-track/confirming/guidelines).

SMSNr.description: Mobile phone number of the contact. Mandatory in some cases. Please see [Guidelines](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/api-endpoints/send-track/confirming/guidelines).

TelNr.description: Phone number of the contact. Either the Email or Telnr needs to be filled in for Non EU destinations. Preferably prefixed with + and the international dialling code.

Content.description: Content of the shipment. Mandatory for Extra@Home shipments

CostCenter.description: Cost center of the shipment. This value will appear on your invoice

Customs.description: The Customs type is mandatory for non-EU shipments and not allowed for any other shipment types.

DeliveryAddress.description: Delivery address specification. This field is mandatory when AddressType on the Address is 09.

DeliveryDate.description: Mandatory when using Mailbox Parcels (for generation of the coding rule) and delivery options like Evening/Morning/Sameday delivery etc.

Dimension.description: Note: Length, Width, Height values are about the order of the size and need to be filled in from the longest to the shortest value. For example: shipment's official height is 700mm, width 500mm, length 300mm. The longest side (highest value) of 700mm needs to be entered at Length. Width value becomes 500mm, Height value: 300mm (the lowest). Entering the dimensions in the wrong order may result in incorrect shipping labels and longer delivery times. The maximum dimensions can be found in your PostNL contract.

Height.description: The shortest side of the shipment in millimeters (mm).

Length.description: The longest side of the shipment in millimeters (mm).

Volume.description: Volume of the shipment in centimeters (cm3). Mandatory for E@H-products.

Weight.description: Weight of the shipment in grams. Approximate weight suffices

Width.description: The second longest side of the shipment in millimeters (mm).

DownPartnerBarcode.description: Barcode of the downstream network partner of PostNL Parcels. Madatory for requesting Parcels Non-EU combilabel product codes.

DownPartnerID.description: Identification of the downstream network partner of PostNL Pakketten.

DownPartnerLocation.description: Identification of the location of the downstream network partner of PostNL Pakketten.

Groups.description: List of 0 or more Group types with data, grouping multiple shipments together. Mandatory for multicollo shipments. Please see [Guidelines](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/api-endpoints/send-track/confirming/guidelines) (Multiple shipments) for more information.

GroupType.description: Group sort that determines the type of group that is indicated. This is a code. For possible values, please see [here](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/reference-codes/group-types)

GroupSequence.description: Sequence number of the collo within the complete shipment (e.g. collo 2 of 4) Mandatory for multicollo shipments

GroupCount.description: Total number of colli in the shipment (in case of multicolli shipments) Mandatory for multicollo shipments

MainBarcode.description: Main barcode for the shipment (in case of multicolli shipments) Mandatory for multicollo shipments

HazardousMaterial.description: Array of hazardous materials contained in the shipment

ToxicSubstanceCode.description: Toxic substance code as stated in the ADR agreement

AdditionalToxicSubstanceCode.description: Array of additional toxic substance codes as stated in the ADR agreement

TunnelCode.description: The code indicating for which category of tunnels passage is prohibited with these goods.

PackagingGroupCode.description: Code identifying the category of the packaging material.

GrossWeight.description: Gross weight of the goods in grams.

ChemicalTechnicalDescription.description: The chemical technical description of the goods.

ProductCodeCollect.description: Deprecated. Collection product code of a shipment.

ProductCodeDelivery.description: Product code of the shipment. See the [Products page](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/product-codes-dutch-domestic) for possible products.

ProductOptions.description: Product options for the shipment, mandatory for certain products, see the [Products page](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/product-codes-dutch-domestic).

Characteristic.description: The characteristic of the ProductOption. Mandatory for some products, please see the [Products page](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/product-codes-dutch-domestic)

Option.description: The product option code for this ProductOption. Mandatory for some products, please see the [Products page](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/product-codes-dutch-domestic)

ReceiverDateOfBirth.description: Date of birth. Mandatory for Age check products

Reference.description: Your own reference of the shipment. Mandatory for Extra@Home shipments; for E@H this is used to create your order number, so this should be unique for each request.

ReferenceCollect.description: Additional reference of the collect order of the shipment

ReturnBarcode.description: Return barcode of the shipment. PostNL will provide you with a separate customer code specifically for generating the returnBarcode. Mandatory for Label in the Box (return label) shipments.

TimeslotID.description: Deprecated. ID of the chosen timeslot as returned by the timeslot webservice

AddressType.description: Address 02 is mandatory. It can either be placed in the Customer segment or in the Shipment segment. Note that if you put it in the Shipment segment, it should go into all Shipment segments.

CompanyName.description: This field has a dependency with the field Name. One of both fields must be filled mandatory; using both fields is also allowed. Mandatory when AddressType is 09.

Department.description: Send to specific department of a company

Doorcode.description: Door code of address. Mandatory for some international shipments.

FirstName.description: Remark: please add FirstName and Name (lastname) of the receiver to improve the parcel tracking experience of your customer.

Floor.description: Send to specific floor of a company

HouseNr.description: Mandatory for shipments to Benelux. Max. length is 5 characters (only for Benelux addresses). For Benelux addresses,this field should always be numeric.

Name.description: Last name of person. This field has a dependency with the field CompanyName. One of both fields must be filled mandatory; using both fields is also allowed. Remark: please add FirstName and Name (lastname) of the receiver to improve the parcel tracking experience of your customer.

Street.description: This field has a dependency with the field StreetHouseNrExt. One of both fields must be filled mandatory; using both fields simultaneously is discouraged.

StreetHouseNrExt.description: Combination of Street, HouseNr and HouseNrExt. Please see [Guidelines](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/api-endpoints/send-track/confirming/guidelines) for the explanation.

Zipcode.description: Zipcode of the address. Mandatory for shipments to Benelux. Max length (NL) 6 characters,(BE;LU) 4 numeric characters

MessageTimeStamp.description: Date/time of sending the message. Format: dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss

Certificate.description: Fill in if applicable, for specific items a export certificate is obliged, as proof that the item complies to the sanity regulations, [more information](https://ondernemersplein.kvk.nl/fytosanitair-of-veterinair-exportcertificaat-aanvragen/). Mandatory for Parcel shipments in the category type Commercial Goods, Commercial Sample and Returned Goods (Certificate, Invoice or License; at least 1 out of 3 must be selected)

License.description: Fill in if applicable. Mandatory for Parcel shipments in the category type Commercial Goods, Commercial Sample and Returned Goods (Certificate, Invoice or License; at least 1 out of 3 must be selected).

Invoice.description: Fill in the invoice number of the shipment. For a faster customs clearing process apply the invoice on the outside of the shipment. Mandatory for Parcel shipments in the category type Commercial Goods, Commercial Sample and Returned Goods (Certificate, Invoice or License; at least 1 out of 3 must be selected).

HandleAsNonDeliverable.description: Determines what to do when the shipment cannot be delivered the first time (if this is set to true,the shipment will be returned after the first failed attempt)

Currency.description: Currency code. only EUR, GBP, USD and CNY are allowed.

ShipmentType.description: Type of shipment, possible values: Gift, Documents, Commercial Goods, Commercial Sample, Returned Goods. Is used to fill in the checkbox on the customs form on the shipment label.

TrustedShipperID.description: Use only when available. This is the reference of the sender. Depending on the destination with this ID, EORI, IOSS, TAX, VAT, VOEC*, the customs process can be faster. Only fill in this customs reference number if the sender is registrated as Trusted Shipper in the country of destination.  *VOEC is a Norwegian VAT number.

ImporterReferenceCode.description: This is the reference of the recipient. Fill in a Tax Code or VAT number or Importer code. Depending on the destination with this reference the customs process can be faster. For example Brazil uses an TAXID number for natural persons, known as CPF.

TransactionDescription.description: Transaction description; see [here](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/reference-codes/transaction-codes) for common examples.

Content.description: The contents of the shipment. This section is mandatory (minimum once, maximum 5). Fill per unique item.

Quantity.description: Fill in the total of the item(s)

Weight.description: Net weight of goods in gram(gr)

Value.description: Commercial (customs) value of goods. Fill in the value of the item(s).

HSTariffNr.description: Specify every item with the standard HS commodity code (6-8-10 digits HS-code), [more information](https://tarief.douane.nl/ite-tariff-public/#/home). Note: punctuation marks and symbols are not allowed.

CountryOfOrigin.description: Fill in the code of the country where the item was produced (ISO-code), [more information](https://www.iso.org/home.html)

Errors.description: Possible errors. See the [Error Codes](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/error-codes) for possible values

Warnings.description: Possible warnings. See the [Error Codes](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/error-codes) for possible values

Description.example: Length of 3S type barcode must be between 13 and 15

LabelSignature.description: GIF image of the signature (as a base64 encoded string) max size: 280x60 mm (1058x226 pixels). This can be used to automatically sign the customs forms. The value of this element can have a maximum size of 65536 characters. Note that the total request can have a maximum size of 200KB. Larger requests will not be accepted by the server for performance reasons. Requests that exceed this limit will not return a validation error,but a HTTP 404 error.

Shipments.description: List of 1 or more Shipments. At least 1 shipment is required.

CollectionLocation.description: Code of delivery location at PostNL Pakketten

CustomerCode.description: Customer code as known at PostNL Pakketten

AddressType.description: Address 02 is mandatory. It can either be placed in the Customer segment or in the Shipment segment. Note that if you put it in the Shipment segment, it should go into all Shipment segments.

CompanyName.description: This field has a dependency with the field Name. One of both fields must be filled mandatory; using both fields is also allowed. Mandatory when AddressType is 09.

Department.description: Send to specific department of a company

Doorcode.description: Door code of address. Mandatory for some international shipments.

FirstName.description: Remark: please add FirstName and Name (lastname) of the receiver to improve the parcel tracking experience of your customer.

Floor.description: Send to specific floor of a company

HouseNr.description: Mandatory for shipments to Benelux. Max. length is 5 characters (only for Benelux addresses). For Benelux addresses,this field should always be numeric.

Name.description: Last name of person. This field has a dependency with the field CompanyName. One of both fields must be filled mandatory; using both fields is also allowed. Remark: please add FirstName and Name (lastname) of the receiver to improve the parcel tracking experience of your customer.

Street.description: This field has a dependency with the field StreetHouseNrExt. One of both fields must be filled mandatory; using both fields simultaneously is discouraged.

StreetHouseNrExt.description: Combination of Street, HouseNr and HouseNrExt. Please see [Guidelines](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/api-endpoints/send-track/labelling/guidelines) for the explanation.

Zipcode.description: Zipcode of the address. Mandatory for shipments to Benelux. Max length (NL) 6 characters,(BE;LU) 4 numeric characters

MessageTimeStamp.description: Date/time of sending the message. Format: dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss

Printertype.description: Printer type that will be used to process the label, e.g. Zebra printer or PDF See [Printer types](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/reference-codes/printer-types) for the available printer types.

Addresses.description: List of 1 or more Address type elements. At least 1 address type is mandatory. See [Address types](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/reference-codes/address-types) for the available types.

Amounts.description: List of amount types. An amount represents a value of the shipment. Amount type 01 mandatory for COD-shipments, Amount type 02 mandatory for domestic insured shipments. Please see [Amount types](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/reference-codes/amount-types) for the available types.

AmountType.description: Amount type. Please see [Amount types](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/reference-codes/amount-types) for the available types.

BIC.description: BIC number,optional for COD shipments (mandatory for bank account number other than originating in The Netherlands)

Currency.description: Currency code according ISO 4217. E.g. EUR

IBAN.description: IBAN bank account number,mandatory for COD shipments. Dutch IBAN numbers are 18 characters

Value.description: Money value in EUR (unless value Currency is specified for another currency). Value format (N6.2): #####0.00 (2 digits behind decimal dot). Mandatory for COD, Insured products (with the exception of certain productcodes with a standard insured amount).

Barcode.description: Barcode of the shipment. This is a unique value. Note: If you leave this attribute out of your request an unique barcode will be generated automatically.

CodingText.description: Code used for logistic purposes (usually generated by the service itself and returned in the response). Please note that this must be provided when  using the Confirm API to confirm shipments where coding texts are required (e.g. letterbox parcels).

CollectionTimeStampStart.description: Starting date/time of the collection of the shipment. Format: dd-MM-yyyy hh:mm:ss

CollectionTimeStampEnd.description: Ending date/time of the collection of the shipment. Format: dd-MM-yyyy hh:mm:ss

Contacts.description: One or more ContactType elements belonging to a shipment. Mandatory in some cases. Please refer to the available [Contact types](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/reference-codes/contact-types) for the possible values.

ContactType.description: Type of the contact. This is a code. Please refer to the available [Contact types](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/reference-codes/contact-types) for the possible values.

Email.description: Email address of the contact. Mandatory in some cases. Please see [Guidelines](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/api-endpoints/send-track/labelling/guidelines).

SMSNr.description: Mobile phone number of the contact. Mandatory in some cases. Please see [Guidelines](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/api-endpoints/send-track/labelling/guidelines).

Content.description: Content of the shipment. Mandatory for Extra@Home shipments

CostCenter.description: Cost center of the shipment. This value will appear on your invoice

Customs.description: The Customs type is mandatory for non-EU shipments and not allowed for any other shipment types.

Certificate.description: Fill in if applicable, for specific items a export certificate is obliged, as proof that the item complies to the sanity regulations, [more information](https://ondernemersplein.kvk.nl/fytosanitair-of-veterinair-exportcertificaat-aanvragen/). Mandatory for Parcel shipments in the category type Commercial Goods, Commercial Sample and Returned Goods (Certificate, Invoice or License; at least 1 out of 3 must be selected)

License.description: Fill in if applicable. Mandatory for Parcel shipments in the category type Commercial Goods, Commercial Sample and Returned Goods (Certificate, Invoice or License; at least 1 out of 3 must be selected).

Invoice.description: Fill in the invoice number of the shipment. For a faster customs clearing process apply the invoice on the outside of the shipment. Mandatory for Parcel shipments in the category type Commercial Goods, Commercial Sample and Returned Goods (Certificate, Invoice or License; at least 1 out of 3 must be selected).

HandleAsNonDeliverable.description: Determines what to do when the shipment cannot be delivered the first time (if this is set to true,the shipment will be returned after the first failed attempt)

Currency.description: Currency code,only EUR and USS are allowed

ShipmentType.description: Type of shipment,possible values: Gift,Documents,Commercial Goods,Commercial Sample,Returned Goods

TrustedShipperID.description: 'Use only when available. Depending on the destination with this ID the customs process can be faster. Only fill in this customs reference number if the sender is registrated as Trusted Shipper in the country of destination'

ImporterReferenceCode.description: Importer reference code. Fill in a Tax Code or VAT number or Importer code. Depending on the destination with this reference the customs process can be faster.

TransactionCode.description: Code and accompanying description according to UPU Codelist 136. Codes to be used are shown below for your reference. Or see the [Reference data](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/reference-codes/transaction-codes).

TransactionDescription.description: Transaction description; see [here](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/reference-codes/transaction-codes) for common examples.

Content.description: The contents of the shipment. This section is mandatory (minimum once, maximum 5).

DeliveryAddress.description: Delivery address specification. This field is mandatory when AddressType on the Address is 09.

DeliveryDate.description: Mandatory when using Mailbox Parcels (for generation of the coding rule) and delivery options like Evening/Morning/Sameday delivery etc.

Dimension.description: Note: Length, Width, Height values are about the order of the size and need to be filled in from the longest to the shortest value. For example: shipment's official height is 700mm, width 500mm, length 300mm. The longest side (highest value) of 700mm needs to be entered at Length. Width value becomes 500mm, Height value: 300mm (the lowest). Entering the dimensions in the wrong order may result in incorrect shipping labels and longer delivery times. The maximum dimensions can be found in your PostNL contract.

Height.description: The shortest side of the shipment in millimeters (mm).

Length.description: The longest side of the shipment in millimeters (mm).

Volume.description: Volume of the shipment in centimeters (cm3). Mandatory for E@H-products.

Weight.description: Weight of the shipment in grams. Approximate weight suffices

Width.description: The second longest side of the shipment in millimeters (mm).

DownPartnerBarcode.description: Barcode of the downstream network partner of PostNL Parcels. Madatory for requesting Parcels Non-EU combilabel product codes.

DownPartnerID.description: Identification of the downstream network partner of PostNL Pakketten.

DownPartnerLocation.description: Identification of the location of the downstream network partner of PostNL Pakketten.

Groups.description: List of 0 or more Group types with data, grouping multiple shipments together. Mandatory for multicollo shipments. Please see [Guidelines](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/api-endpoints/send-track/labelling/guidelines) (Multiple shipments) for more information.

HazardousMaterial.description: Array of hazardous materials contained in the shipment

ToxicSubstanceCode.description: Toxic substance code as stated in the ADR agreement

AdditionalToxicSubstanceCode.description: Array of additional toxic substance codes as stated in the ADR agreement

TunnelCode.description: The code indicating for which category of tunnels passage is prohibited with these goods.

PackagingGroupCode.description: Code identifying the category of the packaging material.

GrossWeight.description: Gross weight of the goods in grams.

ChemicalTechnicalDescription.description: The chemical technical description of the goods.

ProductCodeCollect.description: Deprecated. Collection product code of a shipment.

ProductCodeDelivery.description: Product code of the shipment. See the [Products page](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/product-codes-dutch-domestic) for possible products.

ProductOptions.description: Product options for the shipment, mandatory for certain products, see the [Products page](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/product-codes-dutch-domestic).

Characteristic.description: The characteristic of the ProductOption. Mandatory for some products, please see the [Products page](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/product-codes-dutch-domestic)

Option.description: The product option code for this ProductOption. Mandatory for some products, please see the [Products page](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/product-codes-dutch-domestic)

ReceiverDateOfBirth.description: Date of birth. Mandatory for Age check products

Reference.description: Your own reference of the shipment. Mandatory for Extra@Home shipments; for E@H this is used to create your order number, so this should be unique for each request.

ReferenceCollect.description: Additional reference of the collect order of the shipment

ReturnBarcode.description: Return barcode of the shipment. PostNL will provide you with a separate customer code specifically for generating the returnBarcode. Mandatory for Label in the Box (return label) shipments.

TimeslotID.description: Deprecated. ID of the chosen timeslot as returned by the timeslot webservice

ExtraFields.description: Possibility to provide extra key-value pairs to the webservice. Not used at the moment.

AddressType.description: Type of the address. This is a code. You can find the possible values at [Address types](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/reference-codes/address-types)

CompanyName.description: This field has a dependency with the field Name. One of both fields must be filled mandatory; using both fields is also allowed. Mandatory when AddressType is 09.

Department.description: Send to specific department of a company

Doorcode.description: Door code of address. Mandatory for some international shipments.

FirstName.description: Remark: please add FirstName and Name (lastname) of the receiver to improve the parcel tracking experience of your customer.

Floor.description: Send to specific floor of a company

HouseNr.description: Mandatory for shipments to Benelux. Max. length is 5 characters (only for Benelux addresses). For Benelux addresses,this field should always be numeric.

Name.description: Last name of person. This field has a dependency with the field CompanyName. One of both fields must be filled mandatory; using both fields is also allowed. Remark: please add FirstName and Name (lastname) of the receiver to improve the parcel tracking experience of your customer.

Street.description: This field has a dependency with the field StreetHouseNrExt. One of both fields must be filled mandatory. Using both fields simultaneously is discouraged.

StreetHouseNrExt.description: Combination of Street, HouseNr and HouseNrExt. Please see [Guidelines](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/api-endpoints/send-track/labelling/guidelines) for the explanation.

Zipcode.description: Zipcode of the address. Mandatory for shipments to Benelux. Max length (NL) 6 characters,(BE;LU) 4 numeric characters

Quantity.description: Fill in the total of the item(s)

Weight.description: Net weight of goods in gram(gr)

Value.description: Commercial (customs) value of goods. Fill in the value of the item(s).

HSTariffNr.description: Specify every item with the standard HS commodity code (HS-code), [more information](https://tarief.douane.nl/ite-tariff-public/#/home)

CountryOfOrigin.description: Fill in the code of the country where the item was produced (ISO-code), [more information](https://www.iso.org/home.html)

GroupType.description: Group sort that determines the type of group that is indicated. This is a code. For possible values, please see [here](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/reference-codes/group-types)

GroupSequence.description: Sequence number of the collo within the complete shipment (e.g. collo 2 of 4) Mandatory for multicollo shipments

GroupCount.description: Total number of colli in the shipment (in case of multicolli shipments) Mandatory for multicollo shipments

MainBarcode.description: Main barcode for the shipment (in case of multicolli shipments) Mandatory for multicollo shipments

MergedLabels.description: The merged label output; only returned if the printer type selected in your request merges the pdf labels into a single file (e.g. using GraphicFile|Merge).

items.description: Array of barcodes used in the shipment

Labeltype.description: Type of the label. See possible [Label types](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/reference-codes/label-types)

OutputType.description: Content type of the label, e.g. zebra of pdf.

ProductCodeDelivery.description: The product code of the shipment

Labels.description: All labels belonging to the selected product

Barcode.description: The barcode used on the label

Warnings.description: Possible warnings. See the [Error Codes](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/error-codes) for possible values

Errors.description: A list of errors returned from the webservice. See the [Error codes](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/error-codes) for possible values.

Description.example: Incorrect address specified in address type Sender

errors.description: A list of errors. See [Error codes](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/error-codes) for possible values.

OrderDate.description: The order date of the shipment. Format dd-MM-YYYY HH:mm:ss

ShippingDuration.description: The amount of days it takes for a parcel to be received by PostN. If you delivery the parcel the same day as the order is placed on the webshop, please use the value of 1. A value of 2 means the parcel will arrive at PostNL a day later etc.

HolidaySorting.description: Specifies whether you are available to ship parcels to PostNL during holidays

Options.description: Specifies the delivery and pickup options.

Locations.description: Specifies the number of locations you want returned. This can be a value of 1-3

Days.description: Specifies the number of days for which the timeframes are returned. This can be a value of 1-9

AddressType.description: Address type. 01 is for the receiver address, 02 is for the sender address.

Street.description: Street name; for Belgian addresses, it is strongly recommended to fill in the  street value

HouseNr.description: The house number of the delivery address

Countrycode.description: ISO2 country code. Limited to NL and BE.

Available.description: Specifies whether you are available to process shipments during the selected day

Time.description: Specifies the cutoff time (mandatory when Available is true)

checkoutCutOffDay.description: The day for which the cutoff time applies. 00 is your default cutoff that applies to all otherwise not specified days, 01 to 07 is Monday to Sunday.

checkoutCutOffType.description: Specifies the type belonging to the cutoff time.

Code.description: Warning code (for a possible list of warnings, see the generic error codes page)

Description.description: Warning description (for a possible list of warnings, see the generic error codes page)
Description.example: No delivery option found on date

PickupDate.description: Date from which the parcel can be picked up at the PostNL location

ShippingDate.description: The date when you need to deliver the shipment to PostNL to ensure the expected delivery date is achieved. Will be returned as 'null' if not calculated

PickupTime.description: Time from when the parcel can be retrieved at the pickup location

OpeningHours.description: The standard opening hours of the pickup location

Distance.description: The calculated distance (in meters) between the location specified and the address provided in the request

PartnerID.description: The partner identifier; not used anymore

Sustainability.description: Sustainability score; see [Sustainability codes](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/reference-codes/sustainability-codes) for possible values.

Options.description: The delivery options applicable to the timeframe information. See [Delivery Options](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/reference-codes/delivery-options) for possible values.

ShippingDate.description: The date when you need to deliver the shipment to PostNL to ensure the expected delivery date is achieved. Will be returned as 'null' if not calculated

Sustainability.description: Sustainability score; see [Sustainability codes](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/reference-codes/sustainability-codes) for possible values.

deliverydateOptions.description: The delivery options for which a delivery date is returned. Only one delivery option is specified. See [Delivery Options](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/reference-codes/delivery-options) for possible values.

Sustainability.description: Sustainability score; see [Sustainability codes](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/reference-codes/sustainability-codes) for possible values.

DeliveryOptions.description: The options belonging to the pickup location. The delivery options RETA, UL, PU, DO, BW, RT and BWUL can be shown in the response. Please ignore these codes. These codes are internal PostNL codes.

Distance.description: The distance from the address/coordinates provided in the request to the pickup location returned. Distance in meters.

Latitude.description: The latitude of the pickup location

Longitude.description: The longitude of the pickup location

Name.description: The name of the pickup location

Sustainability.description: Sustainability score; see [Sustainability codes](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/reference-codes/sustainability-codes) for possible values.

PartnerName.description: The partner name belonging to the pickup location. Can be ignored, no longer used.

RetailNetworkID.description: The retail network belonging to the pickup location. Can be ignored, no longer used

locationsOpeningHours.description: The standard opening times of the pickup location

City.description: The city of the pickup location address

Countrycode.description: The country of the pickup location address

HouseNr.description: The house number of the pickup location address

HouseNrExt.description: The house number extension of the pickup location address

Remark.description: Additional information about the pickup location
Remark.example: Dit is een Pakketpunt. Pakketten die je op werkdagen vr lichtingstijd afgeeft, bezorgen we binnen Nederland de volgende dag. Op zaterdag worden alln pakketten die je afgeeft voor 15:00 uur maandag bezorgd.

Street.description: The street of the pickup location address

Zipcode.description: The zipcode of the pickup location address

postalcodeCheckResponse.description: Array of addresses found. If no exact match is available, multiple addresses will be returned.

formattedAddress.description: Full formatted address according to PostNL standard (returns each line as a separate string)

detail.example: Input field 'housenumber' must be a number

ReasonNoTimeframe.description: The reason why no timeframe was returned

Date.description: The date associated with the reason no timeframe was calculated

Description.description: The description associated with the reason no timeframe was calculated

Sustainability.description: Sustainability score; see [Sustainability codes](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/reference-codes/sustainability-codes) for possible values.

NoTimeframesOptions.description: The option for which no timeframe was calculated for a specific date

From.description: The start time of the expected delivery window

Options.description: The delivery option for which the timeframe is calculated. See [Delivery Options](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/reference-codes/delivery-options) for possible values.

To.description: The end time of the expected delivery window

Sustainability.description: Sustainability score; see [Sustainability codes](https://developer.postnl.nl/docs/#/http/reference-data/reference-codes/sustainability-codes) for possible values.

message.example: Failed to resolve API Key variable 'request.header.apikey'
Too many requests. Rate limit exceeded!

Event.Description: Shipment expected, but not yet arrived at PostNL
Pakket is nog niet door PostNL ontvangen of verwerkt
Pakket is nog niet door PostNL ontvangen of verwerkt
